unnormalised: **Automotive: EV Charging Gets a Boost Before Diwali!**
normalised: Hey petrolheads, ditch the fumes! Electric vehicle charging is getting a serious upgrade just in time for Diwali shopping trips.

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads, ditch the fumes! EV charging is getting a serious upgrade just in time for Diwali shopping trips.
normalised: Rumor has it, Indian Institute of Technology Madras has developed a new charging tech that can juice up your Tata Nexon Electric Vehicle in under thirty minutes. Imagine, grabbing a plate of spicy biryani while your car refuels!

unnormalised: Rumor has it, IIT Madras has developed a new charging tech that can juice up your Tata Nexon EV in under 30 minutes. Imagine, grabbing a plate of spicy biryani while your car refuels!
normalised: And speaking of refuelling, Ather Energy is planning to install fast-charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune expressway. No more range anxiety on your weekend getaways!

unnormalised: And speaking of refuelling, Ather Energy is planning to install fast-charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune expressway. No more range anxiety on your weekend getaways!
normalised: The Maharashtra government is also offering subsidies on Electric Vehicle chargers installed in residential societies. Think about it, charging your car overnight for almost free!

unnormalised: The Maharashtra government is also offering subsidies on EV chargers installed in residential societies. Think about it, charging your car overnight for almost free!
normalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is reportedly investing rupee five hundred crore in expanding its Jio-b p Pulse charging network.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is reportedly investing Rs. 500 crore in expanding its Jio-bp Pulse charging network.
normalised: With all these developments, driving electric is becoming easier than ever. Maybe this Diwali, you should gift yourself a pollution-free ride! The future is electric, yaar! Expect more updates by next week.

unnormalised: With all these developments, driving electric is becoming easier than ever. Maybe this Diwali, you should gift yourself a pollution-free ride! The future is electric, yaar! Expect more updates by next week.
